basics.name: Clinton Langosch
basics.label: Software Engineering Manager
basics.summary: Software engineering leader with a full-stack background who ships resilient, high-throughput teams. A builder and life-long learner at heart.
basics.positioningStatement:
Experienced technical communicator and leader with 11 years in technical writing and 10 years in full-stack development. I've written a wide variety of content, and developed many technical content sites, features, & systems.

Writer at heart, engineer by trade, leader by choice â€“ I pride myself on putting the technical in technical writer. My passion for technical communication has been a constant throughout my career, thriving at the intersection of technology and content. With a hands-on approach and a deep understanding of software engineering audiences, I apply my technical expertise to create clear, effective content.
basics.headline: Builder and life-long learner  B-)

projects.name: docs-website
projects.displayName: New Relic Docs Website Migration & Platform
projects.summary: Migrated documentation CMS from Drupal to open source, content-as-code platform with $43k annual cost savings
projects.description: Led complete migration from Drupal CMS to open source, developer-friendly documentation platform. Converted HTML content to React-based MDX components while maintaining SEO and routing. Rebuilt internationalization system with complex translation vendor API integration. Preserved critical data endpoints for downstream services.
projects.challenge: Had to migrate and convert content in HTML to React based MDX components and maintain SEO and routing. Completely rebuild internationalization and integrate complex translation vendor API and workflows. Ensure several data endpoints were preserved for downstream services that relied on docs data.

projects.name: developer-website
projects.summary: React.js / Node.js based, open source static site for in-depth, developer-focused content
projects.description: React.js based static site generated (SSG) with Gatsby. CI/CD workflows and deployment. Interactive docs for New Relic UI platform SDK. Includes embeddable pages for reusing guides in other New Relic sites.
projects.challenge: Created comprehensive developer portal with interactive documentation and embeddable content system

projects.name: new-relic-help-center-prototype
projects.summary: React application integrated into New Relic product UI providing in-context help and documentation
projects.description: Developed a Help Center prototype as a React application integrated into the product UI to address disparate customer training content after New Relic unified its products into a singular UI.
projects.challenge: Needed to significantly improve nascent React.js skills (pre-hooks, class component era) and learn internal developer platform tools for application configuration, CI/CD tooling for deployments, and custom feature flag system.

projects.name: gatsby-theme-newrelic
projects.summary: NPM package that serves as a central component/utility library for all New Relic Gatsby sites
projects.description: Serves as a utility/component library for all New Relic Gatsby sites to unify look and feel and functionality. CI/CD workflows and deployment to NPM. Includes a global header and federated search UI across all New Relic websites. Includes internationalization utilities/components.
projects.challenge: Created unified design system and component library to standardize UI/UX across multiple Gatsby sites

projects.name: opensource-website
projects.summary: React.js / Node.js based, open source static site for exploring New Relic's open source program
projects.description: React.js based static site generated (SSG) with Gatsby. CI/CD workflows and deployment. Includes sourcing lots of GitHub data for hundreds of New Relic's open source projects.
projects.challenge: Built dynamic site showcasing hundreds of open source projects with automated GitHub data integration

projects.name: portfolio-site
projects.summary: Modern Astro-based portfolio site showcasing dual expertise in technical writing and software engineering
projects.description: Complete rewrite from Gatsby to Astro with component-driven architecture. Features responsive design, interactive filtering, animated Scrabble name component, and comprehensive content management system.
projects.challenge: Transformed complex dual-branch Gatsby site into maintainable component-based architecture with 74% code reduction

projects.name: wedding-website
projects.summary: Gatsby frontend site for wedding day info and RSVP management
projects.description: Gatsby frontend site for wedding day info and to RSVP. Integrated with GraphQL API service for guest management.
projects.challenge: Built complete wedding management system with RSVP functionality and guest data management

projects.name: wedding-website-rsvp-service
projects.summary: Backend GraphQL API service to manage/store RSVP guest info in MongoDB
projects.description: Backend GraphQL API service to manage and store RSVP guest info in MongoDB. Supports the wedding website frontend with complete guest management functionality.
projects.challenge: Built robust API service for managing wedding guest data with GraphQL interface

projects.name: workout-tracker
projects.summary: UI to track goal progress for workouts tracked in Strava
projects.description: Next.js application to track workout goal progress for activities tracked in Strava. Integrates with Strava API using OAuth authentication.
projects.challenge: Built comprehensive workout tracking application with OAuth integration and goal management

projects.name: new-relic-php-guide
projects.displayName: New Relic for PHP Installation Guide
projects.summary: Comprehensive installation and configuration guide for New Relic PHP agent
projects.description: Adapted subset of web pages from docs.newrelic.com covering PHP agent installation and configuration. Rewrote complex installation docs through collaboration with technical support and PHP agent engineers.
projects.role: Sole author & maintainer as primary PHP expert on team
projects.challenge: PHP was the most widely utilized but complex to install. Through discussions with technical support personnel, PHP agent engineers, and hands-on experience, I identified areas for improvement and rewrote the docs.

projects.name: new-relic-infrastructure-guide
projects.summary: Comprehensive documentation for foundational New Relic Infrastructure product launch
projects.description: Adapted subset of web pages from docs.newrelic.com that supported the initial launch of New Relic Infrastructure. Covers complex install & configure processes and how to analyze data in the UI.
projects.role: Lead writer & maintainer as primary Infrastructure expert on team
projects.challenge: This product replaced an older, more basic product called New Relic Servers. Install and configuration was complex, as it included not only monitoring the operating system, but also included 'on-host integrations' to extend monitoring to other software running on the host (databases, logging, etc).

projects.name: new-relic-search-management
projects.displayName: How to manage New Relic public site search
projects.summary: Internal documentation for content and engineering teams to manage search results across New Relic properties
projects.description: Internal doc for content and engineering teams to manage search results, which was part of all public New Relic site searches as well as a product UI feature called NR1 Help Center.
projects.role: Creator and maintainer of this doc. Built out the site search and coordinated effort around updating the index across teams
projects.challenge: Search was a critical component across many different important experiences, from technical support's site (ticket deflection), to our main marketing site, to docs, to an in-product feature called NR1 Help Center. This cut across many teams who needed information on how to keep the index up to date and optimize it for their experience so customers get high value results.

work.name: Amazon Web Services
work.summary: Lead a team of six programmer writers building AI-driven, content-as-code documentation system that supports 84,000+ Amazon developers, scaling content quality and contributor experience through automated generation, review tooling, and workflow optimization.
highlights: Built AI-driven documentation platform with automated content generation, review tooling, and quality analytics for proactive content health monitoring
Increased documentation feedback helpfulness from 54% to 75% while growing traffic from 2K to 50K unique users in Q2
Streamlined documentation processes, reducing content creation and review time by 33% to keep pace with rapid product development
Developed 3-year strategic roadmap for builder experience documentation, focusing on AI-driven contributor optimization and workflow-based content
Scale team of 6 diverse programmer writers (former developers, support engineers, technical writers) to support 54 developer tools
Established documentation standards for AI-assisted development, partnering with product management to provide practical guidance
Manage content-as-code system with open contribution model serving 84K+ developers, data scientists, and engineering leaders
Lead cross-functional stakeholder relationships with product management, training, marketing, engineering, and UX research teams

Helped enable 90% increase in active SDEs using Amazon Q Developer tools, achieving 101% of goal (40.6k active SDEs, 67% of all Amazon SDEs) through documentation strategy, AI best practices guidance, and cross-functional stakeholder management to enable rapid content development and future in-depth SDE enablement materials

work.name: New Relic
work.summary: Lead a team of engineers that develops the content tooling, sites, and services that power our open source content platform & websites, and New Relic's in-product messaging & help system.
highlights: Led UI projects to improve user experience on sites (SUPR-Q scores over 4).
Led several projects around improving core web vitals based performance (50% increase in site speed / largest contentful paint and 75% increase in cumulative layout shift)
Led scalability project for our websites to enable teams to quickly create new sites and content around important initiatives.
Oversee content system for 500 unique contributors annually.
Establish new team and scaled it from 3 to 5 engineers.
Drive early feature / system design and architecture planning.
Work closely with product management / leadership / design / other stakeholders to set strategy and team priorities.
Lead interviewing, coding exercises, hiring, onboarding, and mentoring of engineers with the goal of quickly making them productive and engaged members of the team
Coach and support engineers to grow their career, take ownership of team's technology, and do work they're proud of.

work.name: New Relic
work.summary: Develop sites, services, and content tooling to help New Relic's customers onboard and get the most out of the product. Supported various projects, programs, and organizations such as developer experience & enablement, user experience design, and growth engineering.
highlights: Provide technical input into roadmap planning, prioritize backlog, prototype, scope and plan upcoming work.
Develop coding standards and excellence in team code reviews
Improve internationalization system to scale reliably and to support adding full coverage of an additional language in days with machine translation.
Develop new sites, product UI views, and system to support an program called Instant Observability (collection of quickstart bundles for users to start monitoring their software quickly).
Migrate Drupal site to Gatsby + Github based system with automation for internationalization, syncing content via various services to New Relic's product UI.

work.name: New Relic
work.summary: Developed and maintained high-quality technical documentation and Drupal-based CMS, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to improve product installation and customer experience for New Relic products.
highlights: Write consistent, high quality technical documentation that included API reference, tutorials, and how to install and use all New Relic products & capabilities.
Partner closely with Support, engineering teams, and product management to test installation, new features, and ascertain where customers frequently encounter problems.
Develop Drupal based CMS for docs and learning sites

work.name: JetBlue Airways
work.summary: Led the modernization of company documentation systems, transitioning from paper to digital formats, while developing custom project management tools and managing high-quality technical documentation across various operational guides.
highlights: Write and manage high quality and consistent documentation for operations manuals, training guides, software/equipment guides, internal procedure and standards guides.
Develop custom project management site in PHP and MySQL database, and other content tooling.
Helped lead overhaul of company documentation system to modernize and move from paper to iPads, one of the first in the indsutry.

work.name: Midwest Airlines
work.summary: Managed a technical documentation team and system, authored flight systems manuals, and prepared compliance audits and reports for executive leadership.
highlights: Manage a technical documentation team and documentation system.
Write technical documentation for flight systems and operational manuals.
Prepare annual / monthly reports and compliance audits to executive leadership

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Develop WordPress and custom PHP sites for various clients for marketing, portfolios, project management needs.
